info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 20 at 9:14AM AKDT until June 21 at 3:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks AK
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM AKDT Saturday.
* AFFECTED AREA...Middle Yukon Valley and Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys.
* TIMING...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM AKDT Saturday.
* THUNDERSTORM COVERAGE INDEX...4.
* WINDS...Southeast 10 to 15 mph.
* HUMIDITY...As low as 31 percent.
* TEMPERATURES...Lows in the mid 50s. Highs in the mid 80s.
* IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible. Frequent lightning can promote new fire starts. Hot and dry conditions may lead to rapid spread of fires.
info.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public.
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM AKDT SATURDAY FOR LIGHTNING

area.areaDesc: Middle Yukon Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys
